name: Duoc Nguyen
tagline: Pi-shaped engineer: Backend/AI tooling × AI agents/MCP × Product iteration
bio: Engineering Manager at FireGroup, building high-impact products with distributed teams.
I care about developer experience and turning ideas into reality. My work spans AI tooling, real-time systems, and making complex tech accessible.
Side projects include aiocean.io (AI developer tools) and writing at 12bit.vn and onepercent.plus about engineering and product thinking.
Founded Vue.js Vietnam community in 2016, helping bring modern frontend development to Vietnamese developers.
13 years coding, mostly Go and TypeScript. Prefer shipping iteratively over perfect plans. Always exploring how AI can enhance developer workflows.
Find me building MCP servers, Obsidian plugins, or experimenting with AI-powered dev tools. Open to collaboration on developer tooling and AI integration projects.
now: Building invest: TypeScript investment tracker (17+ commits)
AI tooling experiments: Claude plugins & MCP integrations
